message:
Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and significance, worth $1200000 to you. I am extending this offer to you at a special price of $1100000, aiming to ensure that you can secure this masterpiece within your collection.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations.

Best regards,
Alice
